text.section: Two (2) or more shareholders may provide for the manner in which they will vote their shares by signing an agreement for that purpose. A voting agreement created under this section shall not be subject to the provisions of KRS 271B.7-300.
A voting agreement created under this section shall be specifically enforceable.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 66, effective January 1, 1989.
